typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Proposal storage pointer,uint256,uint256) view returns (bool)

documentation.text:
@notice Emergency stop stream for a specific escrow
 @dev This sets GDA member units to zero for the escrow and requests an outflow sync.

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) view external returns (struct IAllo.Pool memory)

documentation.text:
@notice Wrap unwrapped pool tokens into supertokens if needed
 @dev Checks the balance of the underlying pool token and wraps it to supertoken
